mapper.update: update tbl_commute set logout = sysdate where empno=#{empno} and to_char(login,'yyyymmdd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_commute where empno=#{empno} and to_char(login,'yyyymmdd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')
select e.empno,d.dname,e.ename,c.login,c.logout,c.checked from tbl_emp e,tbl_commute c,tbl_dept d where e.empno = c.empno and e.deptno = d.deptno order by empno

select d.dname,a.ename,a.login,a.logout,a.checked from (select e.empno,e.ename, e.deptno,c.login,c.logout,c.checked from tbl_emp e,(select * from tbl_commute where login between to_date(#{startdate}, 'YYYYMMDD') and to_date(#{enddate}, 'YYYYMMDD')+1) c where e.empno=c.empno) a,tbl_dept d where a.deptno = d.deptno and (a.empno in(select empno from tbl_emp where empno=#{empno}) and a.login between to_date(#{startdate}, 'YYYYMMDD') and to_date(#{enddate}, 'YYYYMMDD')+1) order by a.login desc
